EmailTemplate.subject: Want Fresh Fruit In Your Breakroom?

Clearance <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm.aspx?cmp=EBCLEARANCE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
NEW <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> It’s Time For A Snack Changeup! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> You can now get Fresh Fruit delivered right to your office.
How It Works 1. Choose Your Box Size <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 2. Set Your Delivery Frequency One Time <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Weekly <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Bi-Weekly <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Monthly <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 3. Pick Your Delivery Day Tuesday <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Thursday <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> It’s that simple! Order Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/freshfruit?cmp=EBFRUITOCT2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only while supplies last. Sku 7780-0 Small Fruit Box 45 pieces or 7781 Large Fruit Box 75 pieces. Open to Canadian residents Only with Ship To locations in Toronto, Ontario with Postal Codes starting with M4W, M4X, M4Y, M5A, M5G, M5H, M5L, M5S, M5T.
